Articles.Content:
Trying to get a Class E into LKO...

![ScumbagMun.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/3152580/sshots/ScumbagMun.png)

Bring some drills and an ISRU converter and you can mine from the asteroid to get more fuel so you can push it away those annoying Mun encounters. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Push it a little into Kerbin's atmosphere so you can get aerocaptured and then push it out of the atmosphere at apoapsis.
